original_title: Rosamunde Pilcher: Shades of Love-Family Secret
overview: American executive Conrad Tucker sees a photograph in a magazine of the wealthy Aird family's youngest daughter, and begins a quest to discover if she is the result of his affair with her mother Virginia. Determined to learn the truth, he sets out to uncover the family's long-kept secrets along the way.
title: Rosamunde Pilcher: Shades of Love-Family Secret
